text: Algapur (Pron:/ˈalɡəˈpʊə/) is a town and Tehsil or Block in Hailakandi district in the state of Assam, India. It is located 32 km from District headquarters Hailakandi. ==Geography== Algapur is located at .\- Algapur It has an average elevation of 25 metres (82 feet). ==Politics== Algapur is part of Karimganj (Lok Sabha constituency). ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Hailakandi district Category:Hailakandi
title: Algapur
